name: Escape of The Ducklings
description:
Your duck family was attacked by a bunch of hunters and now they sent their hounds to catch you and your ducklings.
Take care of your family by rescuing them along the way to the lake, where you all will be safe of the hunters.
Take part of this stealth adventure together with me!

Special thanks to the creators who contributed with audio assets, and to my family for all their support. And to the Extra Credits team for making all of this possible!
